languages.text: "Я не... я не связывалась с Азуриани. У меня нет для того никаких средств. Но у меня было достаточно времени, чтобы исследовать каменные джунгли твоего мира, пока ты занимал{mf|ся|ась} насущными проблемами, а Путь Изгоя приучил меня смотреть и слушать — в том числе и мон-кай, что обретаются в порту. Случайные разговоры, слухи, оброненные мимоходом слова — все они сложились, словно пестрая мозаика, в туманную картину. Мои братья были замечены в Атласове Пределе — а значит, нам остается лишь потянуть за паутинку из связей и возможностей и узнать то, что сокрыто от невидящих глаз".

traits.locale_text: "Я не... я не связывалась с Азуриани. У меня нет для того никаких средств. Но у меня было достаточно времени, чтобы исследовать каменные джунгли твоего мира, пока ты занимал{mf|ся|ась} насущными проблемами, а Путь Изгоя приучил меня смотреть и слушать — в том числе и мон-кай, что обретаются в порту. Случайные разговоры, слухи, оброненные мимоходом слова — все они сложились, словно пестрая мозаика, в туманную картину. Мои братья были замечены в Атласове Пределе — а значит, нам остается лишь потянуть за паутинку из связей и возможностей и узнать то, что сокрыто от невидящих глаз".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "No, I... I did not contact the Asuryani. I have no means to do so. But I had enough time to explore the stone jungle of your world while you were preoccupied with your urgent matters. The Path of the Outcast has taught me to observe and listen to the world around me — in this case, the throngs of mon-keigh at the port. Errant conversations, rumours, chance words — like parts of a speckled mosaic, they came together to form a hazy image. My kin were seen in the Atlas Reach, and now all we have to do is pull at the web of connections and possibilities to uncover whatever is concealed from the unseeing eye."
languages.original_text: "Я не... я не связывалась с Азуриани. У меня нет для того никаких средств. languages.text: « Non, je... je n'ai pas contacté les Asuryanis. Je n'ai aucun moyen de le faire. Mais j'ai eu le temps d'explorer les jungles de pierre de votre monde pendant que vous étiez {mf|occupé|occupée} à vos affaires pressantes. La Voie de l'Errance m'a appris à observer et écouter le monde qui m'entoure... en l'occurrence, la foule de mon-keigh au port. Des conversations sporadiques, des rumeurs, des paroles fortuites... comme les pièces d'une mosaïque hétéroclite, elles se sont assemblées pour former un semblant d'image. Mon peuple a été aperçu dans les Confins de l'Atlas, et il ne nous reste désormais plus qu'à tirer sur la toile des corrélations et des possibles pour découvrir ce que notre œil ne peut voir. »
languages.original_text: "No, I... I did not contact the Asuryani. I have no means to do so. But I had enough time to explore the stone jungle of your world while you were preoccupied with your urgent matters. The Path of the Outcast has taught me to observe and listen to the world around me — in this case, the throngs of mon-keigh at the port. Errant conversations, rumours, chance words — like parts of a speckled mosaic, they came together to form a hazy image. My kin were seen in the Atlas Reach, and now all we have to do is pull at the web of connections and possibilities to uncover whatever is concealed from the unseeing eye."

traits.locale_text: « Non je, euh... je n'ai pas contacté les Asuryanis. Je n'ai aucun moyen de le faire. Mais j'ai eu le temps d'explorer les jungles de pierre de votre monde pendant que vous étiez {mf|occupé|occupée} à vos affaires pressantes. La Voie de l'Errance m'a appris à observer et écouter le monde qui m'entoure... en l'occurrence, la foule de mon-keigh au port. Des conversations sporadiques, des rumeurs, des paroles fortuites... comme les pièces d'une mosaïque hétéroclite, elles se sont assemblées pour former un semblant d'image. Mon peuple a été aperçu dans les Confins de l'Atlas, et il ne nous reste désormais plus qu'à tirer sur la toile des corrélations et des possibles pour découvrir ce que notre œil ne peut voir. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我……我并没有联系到那些方舟灵族，我没有联系他们的手段。不过，当你忙于紧急事务的这段期间，我在这个世界的水泥丛林中四处观察。流浪者道途教会了我如何观察、倾听周围的世界。我观察着港口的人群，聆听那些流言、传闻、偶然之间的闲谈，就像一幅布满污点的画作一样。所有的线索聚集在一起，构成了一幅模糊的图像，有人在阿特拉斯边际见到了我的族人。如今我们要做的，就是拨开这张充满联系与可能的巨网，揭开我们尚未发现的真相。”
languages.original_text: "No, I... I did not contact the Asuryani. I have no means to do so. But I had enough time to explore the stone jungle of your world while you were preoccupied with your urgent matters. The Path of the Outcast has taught me to observe and listen to the world around me — in this case, the throngs of mon-keigh at the port. Errant conversations, rumours, chance words — like parts of a speckled mosaic, they came together to form a hazy image. My kin were seen in the Atlas Reach, and now all we have to do is pull at the web of connections and possibilities to uncover whatever is concealed from the unseeing eye."

traits.locale_text: “我，呃，我并没有联系到那些方舟灵族，我没有联系他们的手段。不过，当你忙于紧急事务的这段期间，我在这个世界的水泥丛林中四处观察。流浪者道途教会了我如何观察、倾听周围的世界。我观察着港口的人群，聆听那些流言、传闻、偶然之间的闲谈，就像一幅布满污点的画作一样。所有的线索聚集在一起，构成了一幅模糊的图像，有人在阿特拉斯边际见到了我的族人。如今我们要做的，就是拨开这张充满联系与可能的巨网，揭开我们尚未发现的真相。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「いや…アシュリヤーニとは連絡を取っていない。我にはその手段がないのだ。だが、あなたが急ぎの用事に気を取られている間に、あなたたちの世界の石造りのジャングルを探検する時間は十分にあった。追放者の道は、我の周りの世界を観察し、耳を傾けることを教えてくれた。この場合は港にいた大勢のモン＝ケイのことだな。彼らの怪しげな会話、噂、不用意な言葉…まるでまだら模様のモザイク画のように、それらが集まってぼんやりとしたイメージが浮かび上がったのだ。我が血族はアトラス・リーチで目撃された。そして今、我々がすべきことは、そのつながりと可能性の網を引っ張り、人知れず隠されているものを明らかにすることだ」
languages.original_text: "No, I... I did not contact the Asuryani. I have no means to do so. But I had enough time to explore the stone jungle of your world while you were preoccupied with your urgent matters. The Path of the Outcast has taught me to observe and listen to the world around me — in this case, the throngs of mon-keigh at the port. Errant conversations, rumours, chance words — like parts of a speckled mosaic, they came together to form a hazy image. My kin were seen in the Atlas Reach, and now all we have to do is pull at the web of connections and possibilities to uncover whatever is concealed from the unseeing eye."

traits.locale_text: 「いや…アシュリヤーニとは連絡を取っていない。我にはその手段がないのだ。だが、あなたが急ぎの用事に気を取られている間に、あなたたちの世界の石造りのジャングルを探検する時間は十分にあった。追放者の道は、我の周りの世界を観察し、耳を傾けることを教えてくれた。この場合は港にいた大勢のモン＝ケイのことだな。彼らの怪しげな会話、噂、不用意な言葉…まるでまだら模様のモザイク画のように、それらが集まってぼんやりとしたイメージが浮かび上がったのだ。我が血族はアトラス・リーチで目撃された。そして今、我々がすべきことは、そのつながりと可能性の網を引っ張り、人知れず隠されているものを明らかにすることだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Nein, ich ... Ich habe keinen Kontakt zu den Asuryani aufgenommen. Dazu fehlen mir die Möglichkeiten. Aber ich hatte ausreichend Zeit, den Steindschungel Eurer Welt zu erkunden, während Ihr Euch um Eure dringenden Angelegenheiten gekümmert habt. Der Pfad des Ausgestoßenen hat mich gelehrt, die Welt um mich herum wahrzunehmen und ihr gut zuzuhören – in diesem Fall den Chem-Pan-Sey am Hafen. Fehlgeleitete Gespräche, Gerüchte, flüchtige Worte – wie Teile eines Mosaiks fügte sich alles zu einem verschwommenen Bild zusammen. Mein Volk wurde in der Atlasweite gesehen. Das heißt wir müssen jetzt nur noch am Netz der Verbindungen und Möglichkeiten ziehen, um aufzudecken, was dem blinden Auge verborgen bleibt."
languages.original_text: "No, I... I did not contact the Asuryani. I have no means to do so. But I had enough time to explore the stone jungle of your world while you were preoccupied with your urgent matters. The Path of the Outcast has taught me to observe and listen to the world around me — in this case, the throngs of mon-keigh at the port. Errant conversations, rumours, chance words — like parts of a speckled mosaic, they came together to form a hazy image. My kin were seen in the Atlas Reach, and now all we have to do is pull at the web of connections and possibilities to uncover whatever is concealed from the unseeing eye."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, ich, äh, habe keinen Kontakt mit den Asuryani aufgenommen. Dazu fehlen mir die Möglichkeiten. Aber ich hatte ausreichend Zeit, den Steindschungel Eurer Welt zu erkunden, während Euch um Eure dringenden Angelegenheiten gekümmert habt. Der Pfad des Ausgestoßenen hat mich gelehrt, die Welt um mich herum wahrzunehmen und ihr gut zuzuhören – in diesem Fall den Chem-Pan-Sey am Hafen. Umherstreifende Gespräche, Gerüchte, flüchtige Worte – wie Teile eines gesprenkelten Mosaiks fügte sich alles zu einem verschwommenen Bild zusammen. Mein Volk wurde in der Atlas-Weite gesehen, das heißt wir brauchen jetzt nur noch am Netz der Verbindungen und Möglichkeiten ziehen, um aufzudecken, was dem blinden Auge verborgen bleibt."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «No, yo... no he contactado con los Asuryani. No dispongo de medios para ello. Pero he tenido tiempo de sobra para explorar la jungla de piedra de este planeta mientras te ocupabas de tus asuntos urgentes. La senda de los proscritos me ha enseñado a observar y escuchar el mundo que me rodea; en este caso, el bullicio de los mon-keigh en el puerto. Conversaciones erráticas, rumores, palabras aleatorias... piezas de un mosaico que se unen para formar una imagen borrosa. Mi gente ha sido vista en la Cuenca de Atlas, y ahora lo único que tenemos que hacer es tirar de la red de contactos y posibilidades para descubrir lo que se oculta a nuestros ojos».
languages.original_text: "No, I... I did not contact the Asuryani. I have no means to do so. But I had enough time to explore the stone jungle of your world while you were preoccupied with your urgent matters. The Path of the Outcast has taught me to observe and listen to the world around me — in this case, the throngs of mon-keigh at the port. Errant conversations, rumours, chance words — like parts of a speckled mosaic, they came together to form a hazy image. My kin were seen in the Atlas Reach, and now all we have to do is pull at the web of connections and possibilities to uncover whatever is concealed from the unseeing eye."

traits.locale_text: «No, yo... no he contactado con los Asuryani. No dispongo de medios para ello. Pero he tenido tiempo de sobra para explorar la jungla de piedra de este planeta mientras te ocupabas de tus asuntos urgentes. La senda de los proscritos me ha enseñado a observar y escuchar el mundo que me rodea; en este caso, el bullicio de los mon-keigh en el puerto. Conversaciones erráticas, rumores, palabras aleatorias... piezas de un mosaico que se unen para formar una imagen borrosa. Mi gente ha sido vista en la Demarcación de Atlas, y ahora lo único que tenemos que hacer es tirar de la red de contactos y posibilidades para descubrir lo que se oculta a nuestros ojos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Hayır, Asuryanilerle iletişime geçmedim. Öyle bir imkânım yok. Sen acil konularla meşgulken dünyanın taştan ormanlarını keşfedecek zaman buldum. Yurtsuzun Yolu bana çevremdeki dünyayı gözlemlemeyi ve dinlemeyi öğretti. Bu durumda ise rıhtımdaki mon-keigh kalabalıklarını yani. Sapkın sohbetler, söylentiler, tesadüfi sözcükler, benekli bir mozaiğin parçaları gibiydi. Bir araya gelerek puslu bir suret oluşturdular. Soydaşlarım, Atlas Uzanımı'nda görülmüş. Şimdi tek yapmam gereken, bağlantılardan ve olasılıklardan oluşan ağı kendime doğru çekmek ve gözün görmesinin engellendiği şey her ne ise onu açığa çıkarmak."
languages.original_text: "No, I... I did not contact the Asuryani. I have no means to do so. But I had enough time to explore the stone jungle of your world while you were preoccupied with your urgent matters. The Path of the Outcast has taught me to observe and listen to the world around me — in this case, the throngs of mon-keigh at the port. Errant conversations, rumours, chance words — like parts of a speckled mosaic, they came together to form a hazy image. My kin were seen in the Atlas Reach, and now all we have to do is pull at the web of connections and possibilities to uncover whatever is concealed from the unseeing eye."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır, Asuryanilerle iletişime geçmedim. Öyle bir imkânım yok. Sen acil konularla meşgulken, dünyanın taştan ormanlarını keşfedecek zaman buldum. Yurtsuzun Yolu bana çevremdeki dünyayı gözlemlemeyi ve dinlemeyi öğretti. Örneğin bu durumda rıhtımdaki mon-keigh kalabalıklarını. Sapkın sohbetler, söylentiler, tesadüfi sözcükler, benekli bir mozaiğin parçaları gibiydi ve bir araya gelerek puslu bir suret oluşturdular. Soydaşlarım Atlas Uzanımı'nda görülmüş ve şimdi tek yapmam gereken, bağlantılardan ve olasılıklardan oluşan ağı kendime doğru çekmek ve gözün görmesinin engellendiği şey her ne ise, onu açığa çıkarmak."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
